HotelElement.Name: Ramada Plaza Hotel Newark Intl Airport /ewr

Description.Text: The Ramada Plaza Hotel Newark Intl Airport/EWR 178 Room Hotel and Conference Center, located just 1 mile from the Airport, 5 minutes from downtown Newark and only 20 minutes from New York City. Complimentary Shuttle service; Wireless Highspeed; fitness center; restaurant and bar.
The Ramada Plaza Hotel Newark Intl Airport/EWR 412 Room Hotel and Conference Center; located just 1 mile from the Airport; 5 minutes from downtown Newark and only 20 minutes from New York City.
